QuestData.Title: Netherdust Pollen
QuestData.Description: A flower picker?! Hilarious... Unfortunately, our mages and shaman need your services. The netherdust bushes that grow on this ledge have special pollen that is apparently very useful in their magical dealings. Bring me that stuff and I'll consider your work order complete.
QuestData.LogDescription: Taskmaster Varkule Dragonbreath at Dragonmaw Base Camp in Shadowmoon Valley wants you to bring him 40 Netherdust Pollen.
QuestData.CompletionText: Like I said, netherdust pollen is used by our spell casters.
QuestData.RewardText: You're done for today, kid. Come back tomorrow if you're still alive.
